title: Embracing inclusivity and cultural diversity in the workplace
body: Though this past year has been a difficult one – with America finally taking a hard look at the harsh inequalities and racism permeating the culture. But it’s also a hopeful turning point for a brighter future. One of the keys to make a change is education, especially in the workplace. Joshua Dubois,  and former faith advisor to President Obama, discussed how business leaders can practice inclusivity and embrace cultural diversity.
